headline: Alliance for Critical Infrastructure (ACI) Launches to Strengthen National Resilience
summary: NEW YORK, February 26, 2026--The Alliance for Critical Infrastructure (ACI) has officially launched as an industry-led nonprofit coalition aimed at strengthening national resilience. ACI brings together owners, operators, and industry representatives to facilitate collaboration and information exchange, ensuring that critical infrastructure works together to anticipate, deter, and respond to threats. By leveraging the combined resources and expertise of its members, ACI will serve as a central p

headline: Avangrid and Xcel Energy extend offtake agreement for 150 MW power project
summary: Avangrid and Xcel Energy have extended their offtake agreement for a 150 MW power project located on the Minnesota-South Dakota border.

headline: Morgan Stanley Retains an Equal Rating on Xcel Energy Inc. (XEL)
summary: Xcel Energy Inc. (NASDAQ:XEL) is among the 15 Best Electric Utility Stocks to Invest In Now. Xcel Energy Inc. (NASDAQ:XEL) is among the Best Utility Stocks. On February 20, 2026, Morgan Stanley raised Xcel Energy Inc. (NASDAQ:XEL)’s price target from $84 to $91 while keeping an Equal Weight rating. The firm raised its price projections […]

headline: Alphabet Energy Deals Shape Long Term AI Data Center Outlook
summary: Alphabet, parent of Google (NasdaqGS:GOOGL), has entered into major energy deals with Xcel Energy in Minnesota and AES Corporation in Texas to supply new data centers with large-scale clean power. The partnerships include plans for what is described as the world's largest iron air battery system and multi decade energy infrastructure commitments tied to Google's facilities. These projects are designed to support rising power needs from AI and cloud computing while responding to regulatory...
